resources.string: ALL NODES NEED TO BE FILLED BEFORE PLAYING

Welcome to Story Crafter! 
 
-Start your game from the top node! 
Your first choice will go to the left node on the next level; 
Your second choice will go to the right node on the next level. 
-To edit your game, tap on the node you want to edit, and save your story by pressing the "SAVE ENTRY" button. 
-When you finish editing all the nodes, you can proceed to start the game by pressing the "PLAY" button! 
 
-Restart the current game by choosing "Play again"; Make a new game by choosing "Close". 
 
It is time to start your journey!
